attributes.content: Oof... Ah.. That hurts a little...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, you’re awake! Are you okay?!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I’m fine. Just a scratch.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: More importantly, is that the machine Zumama’s been tinkering with all this time?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes. I heard them calling it 'The Big, Ugly Thing'.  So gross...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: It’s pretty badass!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So... Err, huh?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But the big thing definitely beat you down...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I can tell it’s really tough, even through it knocked my lights out before I got a good look at it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hmm, yes it is...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But I never imagined she’d actually put together something like this.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Closure makes some weird gadgets every once in a while, yeah, but even she’d be impressed with Zumama’s machine here. Haha.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wow, are there lots of things like that at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Waaaa! Rhodes Island sounds scary...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Haha, Rhodes Island would blow your little mind.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Haha, now that you mention it, that thing would drive Closure up the wall as soon as she laid eyes on it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? What happened to the Temple?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That monster blew it up.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, so that means the ceremony’s over?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: And so Zumama’s the Great Chief now?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Everyone was pretty shocked at first, but...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Why did I destroy the Temple? It’s simple.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It’s my way of telling you all we’re ending this tradition.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: With your fists, you can beat down ten men. If you’re Gavial, maybe you take a hundred. But more than that?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Even Gavial couldn’t manage.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: There’s a limit to what you can do with your fists.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But with a tool? That’s different. My tribe created this 'Big, Ugly Thing' that effortlessly took down Gavial and destroyed the Temple just as easily.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This is the power of a tool.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Tools can make you all even stronger!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: And so I hereby proclaim the age of machines!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Everyone bought into it, so...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: So she became the Great Chief. Hah, well, that’s an L for me, obviously.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Are you okay with that?;......;You’re right to accept it, Gavial.

attributes.content: Huh? Yep. A loss is a loss.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, I don’t need your comfort. I’m really fine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hmph, duh. Do you know me?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, but I have to apologize to Tomimi. It’s my fault you never got a chance to fight.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...That’s okay. Even if I went up there, it wouldn’t have changed anything.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Yeah, you’re right about that one.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, what do we do now?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Find the engine and the others.;......;Sightseeing?

attributes.content: Ah, right! We need the engine to get back.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And as for the others, if we didn’t see them at the ceremony, maybe they got lost?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Still thinking it over, Doctor? No rush. We’ve got some vacation time left.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Haha, I love this Doctor! Then let’s get some sightseeing in while we look for the engine and the girls.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Erm, well...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh? Those two over there...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, Yota, are you okay?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, it’s just, it kinda...
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Yota!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: I need a shaman!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Hey, let me take a look.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial? You’re alive?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Takes more than that to kill me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Shut up for now. Lay your brother out and I’ll look him over.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Tomimi, get my medical bag.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, okay!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Is he gonna be alright?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: He’s not dead. But he’s not looking good either.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Shortness of breath, foamy, bloody spittle... Hm?  And Originium crystals on the body? !
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Doctor, my initial diagnosis is heart failure brought on by Oripathy.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: It’s Stone Disease. The symptoms aren’t too bad. I have some emergency medicine in my bag, but we need to treat him right away.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stand him up. He can’t lay down. I’ll give him some oxygen.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The Stone Disease did this? Ugh, I told him not to push it.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Hey, what’s your name?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I’m Yogi. That’s my brother, Yota.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Which tribe?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Eunectes.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: What’s wrong, Gavial? Your face is scaring me.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Not now.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I’m asking again: Did Zumama send you into the mines to get ore for her big metal monster?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes. Why?
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: I’m sorry, Doctor. No matter what, I have to pay Zumama a visit.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Because of the 'Stone Disease'?;......;I guess sightseeing can wait.

attributes.content: Nothing gets past you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You’re the Doctor, you definitely know why.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sorry again, Doctor. But I have to do this.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Our tribes don’t have much contact with the outside world. To you and the other operators, we’re a primitive backwater.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But there is one good thing about this place. You heard it, right? They call Oripathy  'Stone Disease' and treat it like an ordinary malady.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sometimes people catch it, sometimes they die of it. But nobody thinks it’s anything special, because people here die from lots of things.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Everyone looks after Oripathy patients like they’re just regular sick people. All they know about the disease is you can catch it in the mines.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So very few people go into the mines. It’s been that way for a long time.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial caught it when she saved me.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Yeah. When Tomimi was little, she snuck into the depths of the mines. I went to rescue her, and I got sick.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Lucky she didn’t.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: If only I got it instead...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Don’t you dare say that. Getting sick is a terrible thing. It’s just bad luck.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: (Whimper)
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.options: So they really ostracized you out of here?

attributes.content: You’ve asked that a couple of times, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: After I got sick, the other tribespeople wouldn’t let me do anything. I couldn’t hunt, I couldn’t even go to a gathering.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And the little runt Tomimi here was the worst. She came over from her tribe and stuck to me like glue. She did everything for me, and I had nothing to do.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: In the end, they wouldn’t even let me join the ceremony.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Day after day, time after time, it was 'Oh no, Gavial, let me do that for you,' you know what I mean...? That’s no life for me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial didn’t smile much after that...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I was so pissed off, I went to the ceremony anyway, and beat the tar out of everyone I saw on the way.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: *Sob*, I shouldn’t have been so pushy, Gavial...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.options: ...That really is a kind of ostracization.;......;Sure wish someone would ostracize me like that!

attributes.content: The reality is, around here, if you can’t fight, you’re nothing. A waste of space.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I’d rather you let me put myself in danger than take away my freedom to do anything.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doctor, don’t you think this is funny?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I think it’s funny. Only after I left the tribe did I realize what kind of hatred people have for Oripathy sufferers.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It took me a long time to figure that out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Tch, watch that tongue of yours, Doctor, or I’ll rip it out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But I know what you mean. Out there, discrimination is what you get as an Oripathy patient.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What I went through back then, though, that was still torture for me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, you got me off on a tangent there. This isn’t what I wanted to talk about.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hmm... What was I saying?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: Big metal monster.;......;The cash you owe me.

attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doctor, help me out here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, I got it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Bullshit.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, I got it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I was thinking about how that great big monster of a machine must’ve taken a ton of iron ore to build.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Put that together with what Zumama was saying,  and we know she definitely sent her people down into the mines to get that ore.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I have heard something like that.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Now I’ve got no problem with that, on its face. If she just had them digging around on the outside, no big deal.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But now people are getting sick, and I have to do something.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I don’t care about her age of machines or whatever. If she’s throwing away lives, she’s earned a clobbering.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: You have my full support.;......;You’re a good doctor, Gavial.

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ooh, you’ve got that penetrating gaze, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hah, but of course.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Tomimi, where is Zumama’s tribe?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Um, I don’t know.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hey, Gavial, I’m really not interested in your hopes and dreams and ideals here. What’s up with my brother?
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Huh? You can understand our Sargonian?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes. The leader taught all of us.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: ...What is that Zumama up to?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Whatever. Anyway, Tomimi, get your minions to carry this one back to your tribe. Have Lancet-2 start treating him.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: If you want your brother to live, you’ll put your trust in me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Okay then, I’ll take him back with me.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh? You’re not coming with me?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah! N-No! Of course I want to go with you, Gavial. But I have a few things that need doing first. I’ll catch up with you later!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: What things? Need my help?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: N-No! I can take care of it myself!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Gavial, do you remember the great waterfall? We’ll meet up there!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Alright. You’re the one and only Gavial, I trust you. But I’m going with!
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: No, you won’t be any help. And there’s something I need you to do for me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Go tell Zumama we need to have a talk.
attributes.name: Gavial
